description:
Are you ready to Kamu-ROCK? Shake up the village with these powerful remixes!

- "Breath of Ire: Rock Remix" BGM
- "Lady of Lightning: Rock Remix" BGM
- "Breath of Ire: Instrumental Rock Remix" BGM
- "Lady of Lightning: Instrumental Rock Remix" BGM

'After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it in the Room Customization section of the Housekeeper menu.
name: "Monster Music: Rock Version" BGM
